body:
Ok, so I have changed this post into a retirement post so I don't have to create a new one and create spam.
 
So since I decided to quit I was thinking I could still help the Build Team out through other ways.

But I can't really help build or do anything really so I have decided to step down and have someone else take my place because Avicus has so many amazing people they could do anything.

I'd like to thank The entire build team for accepting me into the group. That was the first Avicus group I was ever really apart of because in my mind I thought that everyone from Avicus hated me....

I met some really cool people from that group, and I'm glad I applied or I wouldn't have ever met Dawning ,Kyler , Jahaj and many others.

So this is just me thanking you guys :D

Love ya Lots <3
